<div id="tools_and_utilities" class="registered_link"></div>

Compatible tools and utility programs allow you to work with EDB Postgres Advanced Server in a familiar environment. The tools supported by EDB Postgres Advanced Server include:

-   [EDB\*Plus](https://www.enterprisedb.com/docs/edb_plus/latest/)
-   [EDB*Loader](/epas/latest/database_administration/02_edb_loader/)
-   [EDB*Wrap](/epas/latest/epas_security_guide/03_edb_wrap/)
-   [The Dynamic Runtime Instrumentation Tools Architecture (DRITA)](/epas/latest/managing_performance/04_dynamic_runtime_instrumentation_tools_architecture_DRITA/)

For detailed information about the functionality supported by EDB Postgres Advanced Server, see the links in the above list.
